title: Firebase Remote Config
custom_preconds:
[BP-10161](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10161)

Prerequisite - 
Remote Config Setup for: Live Activities configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Verify "live_activities_venues" (within 'Live Activities') is configure with desired values for venueID 
3. Save changes / Publish changes (as needed)


BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform/target_audience)
*For all 30 MLB venueIDS (as of 2023) [IDs+Team+IDs+Venue+IDs](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ticketing/pages/3947618/IDs+Team+IDs+Venue+IDs )- (likely configured in QA as ALL enabled)
[
  15,
  4705,
  2,
  3,
  17,
  4,
  2602,
  5,
  19,
  2394,
  2392,
  7,
  1,
  22,
  4169,
  32,
  3312,
  3289,
  3313,
  10,
  2681,
  31,
  2680,
  2395,
  680,
  2889,
  12,
  5325,
  14,
  3309
]


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN remote config for the specific club's venueID has been added to the array within 'live_activities_venues' key 

WHEN the user logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event for a venueID included in the configuration
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen*


*ensure that the rules (time etc.) are satisfied to show the event's live activity on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity widget for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN remote config for the specific club's venueID has NOT been added to the array within 'live_activities_venues' key (may be best to validate with a different venueID than above)
 
WHEN the user logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event for a venueID NOT included in the configuration
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen*


*ensure that the rules (time etc.) would be satisfied to show the event's live activity on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's lock screen DOES NOT display a Live Activity widget for the event.

title: Live Activity NOT shown for unsupported OS
custom_preconds:
[BP-10301](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10301 )

GIVEN user has an older OS that is supported by BP, but not supported for Live Activities (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: prior to 16.2)
AND user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)
custom_expected:
THEN BP app crash is not witnessed
AND user is able to open, log into BP app 
AND view ticketed event per usual (i.e from HomeTab Card, TicketTab)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TDC event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's lock screen does NOT display a Live Activity for the event

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TM event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TM club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's lock screen does NOT display a Live Activity for the event

title: Load Live Activity via Cached Ticket Data  - Cold Start (app closed)
custom_preconds:
[BP-10171](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10171 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND BP App is NOT open in the background (cold start)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)
AND NTEv2 Home Card is configured (via Card Creator) for the specific venue of the NextTicketed Event (BPapp: 13.1.1 or greater)

**NonGame Events (Concerts, Tours, Test Events, Etc) are NOT currently supported for Live Activities feature**
custom_expected: THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs in the Live Activity Lock Screen widget

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TM event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TM club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes BP app (cold start)
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the TMSDK of the event listed in the Live Activity (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event
AND NTEv2 Home Card is configured (via Card Creator) for the specific venue of the NextTicketed Event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be shown Next Ticketed Event Card (v2)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps the NTE card (above 'Open Tickets' button)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user is shown a header info* particular to the event
AND user is shown a venue image directly below the event header info
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections

*example of Header info:
**Tigers at Guardians (team logos on the right)
**Tue, May 7 * 610 PM EDT
**Progressive Field

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes BP app (cold start)
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the TMSDK of the event listed in the Live Activity (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content:
[FOLLOWING STEPS MAY NO LONGER BE REQUIRED]

SKIP REMAINING VALIDATION, IF ALL TDC VENUES HAVE BEEN ENABLED FOR EVENT HUB FEATURE (NTEv2)
WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TDC event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes BP app (cold start)
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

title: Dynamic Island  - Compact View & Full Platter View *(iPhone14 devices ONLY)
custom_preconds:
[BP-10158](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10158 )

GIVEN the user has an iPhone 14 or 14 pro (Currently only supported for iPhone14 devices)
AND the user has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)
custom_expected:
THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs in the Dynamic Island feature (for iPhone14 devices)
AND section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs in the Lock screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TDC event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications) 
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user expands the dynamic island activity to see more detail

(Touch and hold the activity or swipe from the center to the right or left side)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Platter Full layout is displayed for the Dynamic Island activity
AND the dynamic island Full feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the top left side
*Section number, Row, and Seat info are shown on the left side
*Matchup logos of the teams shown on the top right side
*Game start time shown on the right side

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (compact layout)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (full platter)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TM event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TM club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications) 
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user expands the dynamic island activity to see more detail

(Touch and hold the activity or swipe from the center to the right or left side)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Platter Full layout is displayed for the Dynamic Island activity
AND the dynamic island Full feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the top left side
*Section number, Row, and Seat info are shown on the left side
*Matchup logos of the teams shown on the top right side
*Game start time shown on the right side

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (compact layout)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the TMSDK of the event listed in the Live Activity (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (full platter)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the TMSDK of the event listed in the Live Activity (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

title: Live Activity Rules (Date/Time - START)
custom_preconds:
[BP-10171](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10171 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)


Example Event:
*1:30pm ET (7/26) - Game Start 

11:29am ET (Wed 7/26) - Device date/time FFWD
11:29am ET (Wed 7/26) - BP app Closed
11:30am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Start - (won’t be triggered) until BP app opened
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Open BP app
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Lockscreen click  (validation prior to start of gametime)
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Dynamic island click
1:30pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Game Start 
~~
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Device date/time FFWD
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Lockscreen click (validation prior to end)
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Dynamic island click
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - BP app Closed
4:30pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity End - (won’t be triggered) until BP app opened
4:31pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Open app, witness auto-dismiss [OR allow for Apple configured time(12hrs) to surpass]
custom_expected: THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user's device is within the eligible window for LiveActivity feature
WHEN the user opens AND logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview* of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)


*if TM event, then the user is opened to the TMSDK of the event (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)

custom_steps_separated.content:
[SKIP THIS STEP IF PHONE IS NOT SUPPORTED FOR DYNAMIC ISLAND]

GIVEN the user has an iPhone 14 or 14 pro (Currently only supported for iPhone14 devices)

WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
[SKIP THIS STEP IF PHONE IS NOT SUPPORTED FOR DYNAMIC ISLAND]

WHEN the user expands the dynamic island activity to see more detail

(Touch and hold the activity or swipe from the center to the right or left side)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Platter Full layout is displayed for the Dynamic Island activity
AND the dynamic island Full feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the top left side
*Section number, Row, and Seat info are shown on the left side
*Matchup logos of the teams shown on the top right side
*Game start time shown on the right side

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (compact layout or fully platter)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview* of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

*if TM event, then the user is opened to the TMSDK of the event (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)

title: Live Activity Rules (Date/Time - AUTO-DISMISS)
custom_preconds:
[BP-10171](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10171 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)


Example Event:
*1:30pm ET (7/26) - Game Start 

11:29am ET (Wed 7/26) - Device date/time FFWD
11:29am ET (Wed 7/26) - BP app Closed
11:30am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Start - (won’t be triggered) until BP app opened
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Open BP app
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Lockscreen click  (validation prior to start of gametime)
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Dynamic island click
1:30pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Game Start 
~~
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Device date/time FFWD
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Lockscreen click (validation prior to end)
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Dynamic island click
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - BP app Closed
4:30pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity End - (won’t be triggered) until BP app opened
4:31pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Open app, witness auto-dismiss [OR allow for Apple configured time(12hrs) to surpass]
custom_expected: THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user's device is within the eligible window(ideally near the end of eligibility) for LiveActivity feature
WHEN the user opens AND logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content:
[SKIP THIS STEP IF PHONE IS NOT SUPPORTED FOR DYNAMIC ISLAND]

GIVEN the user has an iPhone 14 or 14 pro (Currently only supported for iPhone14 devices)

WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: [FFWD Device DATE/TIME as needed]

GIVEN the user's device is outside the eligible window(currently 3 hrs after game start) for LiveActivity feature
WHEN the user opens AND logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's lock screen NO LONGER displays a Live Activity for the event

custom_steps_separated.content:
[SKIP THIS STEP IF PHONE IS NOT SUPPORTED FOR DYNAMIC ISLAND]

GIVEN the user has an iPhone 14 or 14 pro (Currently only supported for iPhone14 devices)
AND the user's device is outside the eligible window(currently 3 hrs after game start) for LiveActivity feature

WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is NO LONGER displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)

custom_steps_separated.content:
[Otherwise the activity can potentially sit on the user's lock screen for 12 hours after the activity starts. (12 hour time is an Apple limit)] 

This may be difficult to validate, and is ultimately out of Ballpark App's control -- simply noting as information

title: Live Activity Rules (Date/Time - MANUAL-DISMISS)
custom_preconds:
[BP-10171](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10171 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and/or TDC events)


Example Event:
*1:30pm ET (7/26) - Game Start 

11:29am ET (Wed 7/26) - Device date/time FFWD
11:29am ET (Wed 7/26) - BP app Closed
11:30am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Start - (won’t be triggered) until BP app opened
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Open BP app
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Lockscreen click  (validation prior to start of gametime)
11:31am ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Dynamic island click
1:30pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Game Start 
~~
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Device date/time FFWD
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Lockscreen click (validation prior to end)
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Live Activity Dynamic island click
4:29pm ET (Wed 7/26) - Manual-dismiss
custom_expected: THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the user's device is within the eligible window(ideally near the end of eligibility) for LiveActivity feature
WHEN the user opens AND logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content:
[SKIP THIS STEP IF PHONE IS NOT SUPPORTED FOR DYNAMIC ISLAND]

GIVEN the user has an iPhone 14 or 14 pro (Currently only supported for iPhone14 devices)

WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates to lock screen
AND the user manually dismisses the Live Activity (swipe left on the activity, until 'Clear' is shown
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user's lock screen NO LONGER displays a Live Activity for the event

custom_steps_separated.content:
[SKIP THIS STEP IF PHONE IS NOT SUPPORTED FOR DYNAMIC ISLAND]

GIVEN the user has an iPhone 14 or 14 pro (Currently only supported for iPhone14 devices)
WHEN the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is NO LONGER displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)

title: Filter out 'Access:PARKING' tickets
custom_preconds:
[BP-10340](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10340 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.3.2 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)
AND the user has Parking ticket w/ Venue Ticket
custom_expected:
THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for both TDC & TM clubs for ONLY the VENUE ticket* 

*Parking ticket should be filtered from being shown in the Live Activity widget (lockscreen / dynamicisland)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TDC event as next upcoming event w/ both Parking AND Venue ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN W/ JUST VENUE TICKET INFO]

THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to Home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN W/ JUST VENUE TICKET INFO]

THEN the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user expands the dynamic island activity to see more detail

(Touch and hold the activity or swipe from the center to the right or left side)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN W/ JUST VENUE TICKET INFO]

THEN the Platter Full layout is displayed for the Dynamic Island activity
AND the dynamic island Full feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the top left side
*Section number, Row, and Seat info are shown on the left side
*Matchup logos of the teams shown on the top right side
*Game start time shown on the right side

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (compact layout)
OR
WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the dynamic island (full platter)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content: [REPEAT ABOVE VALIDATION W/ ACCT HAVING TM EVENT W/ BOTH PARKING AND VENUE TICKET FOR A GIVEN EVENT]
custom_steps_separated.expected:
(substitute Native Scanview that is shown for TDC clubs, with TMSDK webview]

THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the TMSDK of the event listed in the Live Activity (user may need to sign into TMSDK, if not prev logged in)
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

title: Live Activity Forward Rules - Single Ticket (TDC)  Forward Complete
custom_preconds:
[BP-10291](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10291 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.3.3 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TDC events)
AND the user has tickets in desired forwarded states
AND the user is eligible for the LiveActivity widget to be shown*


*Current Logic: Activity can start 2 hours before all the way up to 3 hours after.
custom_expected:
THEN section, row and seat is displayed in the pre-game state for ONLY non-forwarded ticket* 

*Forwarded ticket should be filtered from being shown in the Live Activity widget (lockscreen / dynamicisland)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with a TDC event as next upcoming event w/ a single Venue ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN]

THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: [ONLY APPLIES FOR Phones supporting DynamicIsland - iPhone14/15 devices)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen*

*DynamicIsland widget can be confirmed, if device supports
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user completes a forward* of the single ticket 

*any method of ticket forwarding is acceptable, but requires forward to be completed (NOT PENDING)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user has NO active ticket on their acct

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user opens BP app
AND the user closes/backgrounds BP app

*needed to trigger the auto-removal of the widget (but can be removed manually w/o opening/closing BP app)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is no longer displayed the Live Activity Widget*


*Should not be shown on the Lock Screen NOR DynamicIsland (if supported)

[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN]

WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen*

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user shares the single ticket 

*requires forward to be PENDING (via share link is best)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user has a forward pending ticket on their acct

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN FOR PENDING TRANSFER]

THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)

AND the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user's forwarding recipient accepts the ticket

[best to accept transfer on another device]
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the sending user has NO active ticket on their acct

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the original(sending) user opens BP app
AND the user closes/backgrounds BP app

*needed to trigger the auto-removal of the widget (but can be removed manually w/o opening/closing BP app)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is no longer displayed the Live Activity Widget*

*Should not be shown on the Lock Screen NOR DynamicIsland (if supported)

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes/backgrounds BP app
AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN]

THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

custom_steps_separated.content: [ONLY APPLIES FOR Phones supporting DynamicIsland - iPhone14/15 devices)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND the user is displayed a dynamic island when on the Home Screen (or other applications)
AND the dynamic island feature has:
*a Ballpark logo shown on the left side
*Section number shown on the right side
**if 7 or less characters, “Sec xyz” is displayed
**if greater or equal to 8 characters, ticket icon is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Live Activity shown on the lock screen*

*DynamicIsland widget can be confirmed, if device supports
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to BP app, opened to the Scanview of the event listed in the Live Activity
AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user completes a forward* of a single ticket 

*any method of ticket forwarding is acceptable, but requires forward to be completed (NOT PENDING) - via auto-accept OR manually accepting if receiving user is not verified
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user has a forward completed ticket on their acct
AND user has at least ONE active ticket on their acct

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the original(sending) user opens BP app
AND the user closes/backgrounds BP app

*needed to trigger the auto-update of the widget
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[LA WIDGET SHOULD BE SHOWN - UPDATED]

THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)
*Team matchup logos (top right w/in widget)
*Seat information - Sec/Row/Seat (bottom left w/in widget)
*Game start time (bottom right w/in widget)
**time shown in time zone of device

NOTE: the seat section should be updated to the next Active ticket, if the pending forward that was accepted was the seat originally shown in the widget

title: Live Activities - Analytics Tracking [Proxy]*
custom_preconds:
[BP-10155](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10155)


(requires access to a proxy tool to verify the tracking)

*this can be captured with proxy tool by viewing https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net/b/ss/ request


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (BPapp: 12.2.0 or greater, iOS: 16.2 or greater)
AND the user has tickets already added to the BP account configured for Live Activities (TM and TDC events)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user logs into BP app with an event as next upcoming event (TM/TDC should behave the same)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is shown Home page with a Next Ticketed Event card (for TDC club)

custom_steps_separated.content:

AND the user navigates to lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's lock screen displays a Live Activity for the event showing:
*Ballpark logo (top left w/in widget)

AND the Seat information (Sec/Row/Seat) matches what is shown in the Live Activity
AND the game start time matches what is shown in the Live Activity (time shown in local timezone of the event)

trackAction:@"MLB Ballpark : Live Activities : Lock Screen Click"
contextData: {
  traffic.team: "CLE",
  ticket.matchup: "ARI@CLE on 04.26.2023"} (where the team and matchup correctly matches the event being tested)
